idea-plugin.name: Arc Theme Dark
idea-plugin.description:
Arc dark look alike visual theme for Intellij IDEA. Default accented color is blue or orange.

For version 2019.3 and above.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0
  • Moved dark theme outside of the light theme plugin.
  • Darkened editor and list/tree/table background colors to better match Arc GTK theme.
  • Fixed buttons background color to better match Arc GTK theme.
